name: Kimco Realty Corp.
description: Kimco Realty Corp. is a leading owner and operator of open-air shopping centers, primarily in the United States. Founded in 1989 and headquartered in New Hyde Park, New York, Kimco focuses on the development and management of high-quality retail real estate that enhances the shopping experience and drives tenant success. The company holds a diverse portfolio of shopping centers, including grocery-anchored and mixed-use properties strategically located in urban and suburban markets. Kimco's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its efforts to develop environmentally friendly properties and promote energy efficiency across its portfolio. The company is also recognized for its innovative approach to revitalizing shopping centers and creating vibrant community spaces. With a strong emphasis on tenant relationships and community engagement, Kimco Realty strives to adapt to the changing retail landscape, ensuring that its properties meet the evolving needs of consumers and businesses alike. As a publicly traded REIT (Real Estate Investment Trust), Kimco Realty is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders through prudent management and strategic acquisitions.
headquarters: New Hyde Park, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Kimco Realty Corp. | Leading Owner and Operator of Shopping Centers
seo.meta_description: Explore Kimco Realty Corp., a premier retail real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on owning and managing open-air shopping centers. Discover Kimco's commitment to sustainability and community engagement.

faq.question: What does Kimco Realty do?
faq.answer: Kimco Realty is a real estate investment trust that owns and operates shopping centers, focusing on grocery-anchored and mixed-use properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Kimco Realty?
faq.answer: Conor Flynn is the CEO of Kimco Realty Corp.

faq.question: Where is Kimco Realty headquartered?
faq.answer: Kimco Realty is headquartered in New Hyde Park, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Kimco Realty manage?
faq.answer: Kimco Realty manages grocery-anchored centers, mixed-use developments, and community shopping centers.
